#home-page 
#### Access [[Daily Journal]]
---
> [!example]+ Tasks
> > [!todo]+ Due Today
> > ```tasks
> > due today
> > # not done
> > hide recurrence rule, created date, priority
> > ```
> 
> %% > [!tip]+ Scheduled Today
> > ```tasks
> > scheduled today
> > not done
> > hide recurrence rule, created date, priority
> > ``` %%

### Recent Work
```dataview
table file.mtime as "Last Modified"
from #active
sort file.mtime desc
limit 5
```
